amendment.description: To provide that, of the funds authorized under title XIV, $20,000,000 may be made available for the procurement of hemostatic agents, including blood-clotting bandages, for use by members of the Armed Forces in the field.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4309 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4309 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To provide that, of the funds authorized under title XIV, $20,000,000 may be made available for the procurement of hemostatic agents, including blood-clotting bandages, for use by members of the Armed Forces in the field.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4309 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4309 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
